attributes.action: Ban Alcohol from the Houses of Parliament
attributes.additional_details:
There should be a total ban on alcohol in the House of Parliament. This should not be in any way tax payer funded. If alcohol is purchased then it should be at full price from a vendor which is not attached to the government and only for official functions, for which there should be a strict approvals process to follow to allow this.

Members of Parliament are there to work for the People - not be paid to drink while on duty or at the expense of tax payers.
